Articles.Content:
I recently got a new pc, so when I downloaded KSP Steam edition I had no mods. One of the mods I previously had was Kerbal Engineer Redux, and one of my space stations had a part from KER and wasn't loaded since it was missing the part. I downloaded KER again but the station is still gone. Is there a way to recover my station (and Bill) or should I just build a new one?

Thanks,

JR
Load an older save from before the station was deleted - there should be backup saves, but I'm not on my game computer to look up where they are kept

On 2/10/2020 at 9:36 PM, Cavscout74 said:

Load an older save from before the station was deleted - there should be backup saves, but I'm not on my game computer to look up where they are kept

Thanks - I'm not home either right now but I believe I know where the backups are saved.
